UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Identification and Characterisation of the Antimicrobial Peptide, Phylloseptin-PT, from the Skin Secretion of Phyllomedusa tarsius, and Comparison of Activity with Designed, Cationicity-Enhanced Analogues and Diastereomers.
Literature.Author: Gao Y, Wu D, Xi X, Wu Y, Ma C, Zhou M, Wang L, Yang M, Chen T, Shaw C

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 10788(MIC=128µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 10788(MBC=256µg/ml),Escherichia coli NCTC 10418(MIC=512µg/ml),Escherichia coli NCTC 10418(MBC=>512µg/ml),Candida albicans NCPF 1467(MIC=128µg/ml),Candida albicans NCPF 1467(MBC=256µg/ml)
